text: Boys like You may refer to: *"Boys like You" (Gail Davies song), 1984 *"Boys like You" (360 song), 2011 *"Boys Like You" (Who Is Fancy song), featuring Ariana Grande and Meghan Trainor, 2015 *"Boys like You", song by Loretta Lynn from Songs from My Heart, 1965 *"Boys like You", song by Brenda K. Starr from I Want Your Love, 1985 *"Boys like You", song by Leona Naess from I Tried to Rock You But You Only Roll, 2001 *"Boys like You", song by Megan and Liz *"Boys like You", song by Carter's Chord *"Boys Like You", song by VVAVES featuring Iggy Azalea, 2019 *"Boys Like You", song by Dodie Clark, 2019 *"Boys Like You", song by Anna Clendening
title: Boys like You
